CADI.Proxy.Core

Class TransparentProxyWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • CADI.Proxy.Core.ProxyWorker
        • CADI.Proxy.Core.TransparentProxyWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TransparentProxyWorker
extends ProxyWorker
    This class implements a transparent JPIP proxy. It is the most simple kind of proxy only performing a forwarding of client request to the server and sending the server response to clients. It does not neither change any of client request parameters nor the server response.

    Usage example:
      construct
      setParameters
      run

    Version:
    1.0 2010/01/13
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)
